titleStmt.title: The humble petition of many thousand citizens and inhabitants in and about the City of London To the Parliament of the Common-Wealth of England. Together with the Parliaments answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Livewell Chapman at the Crown in Popes-head-alley,

notesStmt.note: The publication year is given in Lady Day dating.
The Commons' reply is dated 15 Feb. 1658[/9].
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
